actionable_insights.title: Inconsistent Food Quality and Execution (Bellingham Palace)
actionable_insights.description: Bellingham Palace struggles with consistent food quality and recipe execution, as seen by the stuffed french toast example. Park Ave Pizza should emphasize food quality, standardization, and staff training to capitalize on BP's shortcomings. Focus on consistently delivering classic pizza.
actionable_insights.proof_quote: When I opened my plate I said wt* is this! I ordered stuffed French toast which was made with grinder bread 😳 This had to be 6”thick.

actionable_insights.title: Strong Reputation and Service Excellence (Bellingham Palace)
actionable_insights.description: Bellingham Palace receives praise for its excellent service and friendly staff. Park Ave Pizza must maintain similar levels of service to compete effectively. Monitor staffing strategies and customer service training at Bellingham Palace.
actionable_insights.proof_quote: Great pizza place with excellent service. The staff is friendly and the food is always fresh.

actionable_insights.title: Capitalize on a menu that does not focus on pizza
actionable_insights.description: Bellingham Palace has a menu that is "classic American breakfast, great lunch and dinner (italian,american,comfort)" and not a main focus on pizza. Park Ave Pizza should dominate with their pizza menu, deals, and specials.
actionable_insights.proof_quote: Always a comfortable setting the staff if always sweet and attentive. The food is great classic American breakfast, great lunch and dinner.

actionable_insights.title: Comfortable Setting & Sweet Staff
actionable_insights.description: Bellingham Palace provides a very comfortable atmosphere with very sweet and attentive staff. Park Ave Pizza should look to counter this threat by improving their dine-in setting, as well as training their staff to be more attentive to the customers in the restaurant.
actionable_insights.proof_quote: Always a comfortable setting the staff if always sweet and attentive.

actionable_insights.title: Service Decline Opportunity
actionable_insights.description: Customers indicate a decline in service quality at Bellingham Palace. Park Ave Pizza should capitalize on this by ensuring consistently friendly and attentive service, creating a competitive advantage.
actionable_insights.proof_quote: Used to be great, but honestly the quality of the food as well as the service has gone downhill. Service used to be friendly, cheerful, now ya barely get a smile

actionable_insights.title: Poor Menu Mailing & Delivery Service (Bellingham Italian Pizza and Grill)
actionable_insights.description: Bellingham Italian Pizza and Grill needs to fulfill delivery once they mail their menu. Park Ave Pizza should leverage this by always being available and willing to delivery their food.
actionable_insights.proof_quote: If your gonna mail me your menu and if I want to order from your restaurant- make sure your professionalism and your willingness to provide the delivery is available

actionable_insights.title: Excellent Pizza Quality (Bellingham Italian Pizza and Grill)
actionable_insights.description: Bellingham Italian Pizza and Grill receives high praise for its pizza quality, particularly the balance of sauce and cheese. Park Ave Pizza must maintain or exceed this quality to compete. Regular QC reviews and audits should be performed.
actionable_insights.proof_quote: Without a foubtthe best pizza I have had in my 30 years of living. The perfect balance between sauce and cheese.

actionable_insights.title: Focus on unique and freshly seasoned food.
actionable_insights.description: Bellingham Italian Pizza and Grill seasons the food very well, as well as using fresh ingredients. Park Ave Pizza should ensure to have unique and fresh ingredients on their menu.
actionable_insights.proof_quote: Ordered a meatball sub and like everything today we’re not getting whole meatballs on today’s economy…that being said…everything from the bread to the peppers was very fresh.

actionable_insights.title: Pizza quality competitive advantage
actionable_insights.description: Bellingham Italian Pizza and Grill customers rate it as the best pizza. Park Ave Pizza needs to make sure their pizza has a competitive advantage via deals or specific qualities like being low calorie.
actionable_insights.proof_quote: Without a foubtthe best pizza I have had in my 30 years of living. The perfect balance between sauce and cheese.

actionable_insights.title: Improve the ordering process.
actionable_insights.description: Bellingham Italian Pizza and Grill provides a great ordering experience for the customer and has good customer service. Park Ave Pizza should focus on improving their ordering experience to compete.
actionable_insights.proof_quote: The people here are pleasant and professional from ordering via phone to picking up.

actionable_insights.title: Order Accuracy Issues (Supreme Pizza)
actionable_insights.description: Supreme Pizza has order accuracy problems. Park Ave Pizza should improve or maintain accuracy in orders to capitalize on this and attract customers seeking reliability.
actionable_insights.proof_quote: Not sure what’s going on lately, but they can’t seem to get the orders right.

actionable_insights.title: Quality and Non-Greasy Pizza (Supreme Pizza)
actionable_insights.description: Supreme Pizza is praised for its quality and non-greasy pizza. Park Ave Pizza must ensure comparable quality to maintain competitiveness and appeal to health-conscious customers.
actionable_insights.proof_quote: The pizza was excellent and wasn't the least bit greasy.

actionable_insights.title: Improve Phone order taking and attentiveness
actionable_insights.description: Supreme Pizza's service attentiveness is poor over the phone. Park Ave Pizza should have a friendly staff over the phone.
actionable_insights.proof_quote: The girls who take my order over the phone have me repeating everything, like theyre drifting off into space.

actionable_insights.title: Excellent Service & Good Food
actionable_insights.description: Supreme Pizza provides great food and service. Park Ave Pizza needs to match this threat and provide even better food and service.
actionable_insights.proof_quote: Great pizza place with excellent service. The staff is friendly and the food is always fresh.

actionable_insights.title: Delivery Time Optimization (Supreme Pizza)
actionable_insights.description: Supreme Pizza has delivery delays. Park Ave Pizza should optimize delivery processes to ensure promptness and win customers seeking convenience and speed.
actionable_insights.proof_quote: Delivery takes a ridiculously long time.

negative.text: When I opened my plate I said wt* is this! I ordered stuffed French toast which was made with grinder bread 😳 This had to be 6”thick. Like how can anyone eat that. No strawberries inside but they gave
negative.full_text: When I opened my plate I said wt* is this! I ordered stuffed French toast which was made with grinder bread 😳 This had to be 6”thick. Like how can anyone eat that. No strawberries inside but they gave me a freezing cold size of strawberries in juice (not sweetened). This was $15. My husbands bacon also looked shredded and fatty. I wanted regular breakfast with beans but saw that a side of beans is $6.29! You can make a 5 quart pot for that price.

positive.text: Great pizza place with excellent service. The staff is friendly and the food is always fresh. Highly recommend the pepperoni pizza.
positive.full_text: Great pizza place with excellent service. The staff is friendly and the food is always fresh. Highly recommend the pepperoni pizza.

positive.text: I have been coming here for years the food is always wonderful! Although my palate has changed since being a child and ordering chocolate chip pancakes. Today we ordered the Irish Benedict and the chi
positive.full_text: I have been coming here for years the food is always wonderful! Although my palate has changed since being a child and ordering chocolate chip pancakes. Today we ordered the Irish Benedict and the chicken and waffles both dishes were phenomenal!! Our server was so friendly and attentive. She even had the kitchen divide each order in to 2 plates so we were able to sample. That was such a great idea.

neutral.text: Had a wonderful experience here. The atmosphere is cozy and the prices are reasonable. Will definitely come back.
neutral.full_text: Had a wonderful experience here. The atmosphere is cozy and the prices are reasonable. Will definitely come back.

neutral.text: Used to be great, but honestly the quality of the food as well as the service has gone downhill.  Service used to be friendly, cheerful, now ya barely get a smile from these waitresses.  Had to ask fo
neutral.full_text: Used to be great, but honestly the quality of the food as well as the service has gone downhill.  Service used to be friendly, cheerful, now ya barely get a smile from these waitresses.  Had to ask for splenda three times before it finally arrived. And the steak in the steak omelet reminded me of those steakum type things from the freezer section.  Definitely not worth the $20+ that that build your own omelet ended up costing.  Oh, and the prices have gone up drastically too.

positive.full_text: Ordered a meatball sub and like everything today we’re not getting whole meatballs on today’s economy…that being said…everything from the bread to the peppers was very fresh. neutral.text:
First time ordering from this establishment.
The people here are pleasant and professional from ordering via phone to picking up.
The pizza had ample cheese (about time I find a place that does that).
neutral.full_text:
First time ordering from this establishment.
The people here are pleasant and professional from ordering via phone to picking up.
The pizza had ample cheese (about time I find a place that does that)...my only suggestion, not complaint, is to cook the pizza a smidgen more.
Though tasty, bottom needs to brown and crust, little more crusty.
All in all, good job guys and best of luck.

negative.text: The girls who take my order over the phone have me repeating everything, like theyre drifting off into space. Food is awesome, service not so much. It’s funny when the male employee takes the order mu
negative.full_text: The girls who take my order over the phone have me repeating everything, like theyre drifting off into space. Food is awesome, service not so much. It’s funny when the male employee takes the order much better over the phone.

negative.text: Not sure what’s going on lately, but they can’t seem to get the orders right. Paid for extra ranch on my BBQ chicken, bacon ranch pizza and got zero ranch but extra cheese. Today I asked for my steak
negative.full_text: Not sure what’s going on lately, but they can’t seem to get the orders right. Paid for extra ranch on my BBQ chicken, bacon ranch pizza and got zero ranch but extra cheese. Today I asked for my steak and cheese sub to be extra toasted and it wasn’t toasted at all. Always order online so I know they see what I ordered. Starting to think twice about this place. It’s not what it used to be!

negative.text: Delivery takes a ridiculously long time. I ordered pizza from here twice between March and April 2025. First time, I placed an order at 3:45 on a weekday, pizza wasn't delivered until 5:15. Second tim
negative.full_text: Delivery takes a ridiculously long time. I ordered pizza from here twice between March and April 2025. First time, I placed an order at 3:45 on a weekday, pizza wasn't delivered until 5:15. Second time, similar - ordered at 4;00 didn't receive pizza until 5:30. I'm only a 5 minute drive away from them! They skimp on the sauce and toppings. Cheese was heavy and "gloopy." Both times, pizza was barely warm, bordering on being cold. I'm not ordering from here again and I don't recommend ordering from them.
